Empath::

"Yes, it IS a little unusual to see someone brazenly displaying the 
Decepticon sigil in a Maximal- and Autobot-inhabited base." Empath 
agrees.  "But I'm here on a specific agreement with Commander Rodimus 
Prime, hence the exception.  Now, let me show the two of you to your 
quarters."  She beckons them out of the room, and adds a private 
message for Sanguine via telepathy: <I know who you are.  Cross me 
and consider your cover blown.>

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Amperion::
>        He looks at her quizzically glancing at her wing 
emblems.  "Bit out of 
> place aren't you?"  He then looks confused and glances around 
rapidly.  "How 
> did I know that?  I'm sorry I'm just a bit disoriented.  My name is 
Amperion. 
>  It is my pleasure to make your acquaintance."  He makes a very 
formal and 
> crisp bow.
